page.title: 18SURNAMES IN MILDENHALL
page.content: The main thing we found out in this survey is that few names have survived since the{1881 census.}A few like Barnett have survived but the others have either moved out of the area or died out.We also found out that although some people must have moved out of the area there are still many local people around.There were a few foreign names mostly by marriage. We looked up the meaning of some of the surnames and found the results quite interesting eg Gross was given to somebody who was thick,big or fat. In the{church}we found the oldest grave is dated 1684 and the newest is dated 1982.The youngest person buried there was Albert Sawyer who was 5 months old.The oldest person buried there was a Maud Chambers who died at 101.
